div.div: Updates from emailed announcements shared here
The Danbury Education Foundation just awarded over $57,000 to inspiring teachers!

h3.a: Congratulations to the Danbury Theater Students

div.div: Danbury Theater has triumphed at the UIL One Act Play competition and was given the 2020 Alternate Play award, as well as three students receiving individual awards.
Location: Gravel Road behind Danbury Elementary School by Band Hall

Danbury ISD is participating in the FundingFactory Recycling Program! This fundraiser is FREE and simple because there is nothing to sell, no paperwork to fill out and no deadline. The program runs year-round, accumulating constant income for our efforts. But we won't get very far without your support. Please donate your empty printer cartridges, cell phones, small electronics, and laptops to Danbury ISD and we will take it from there! We will recycle the cartridges, cell phones, small electronics, and laptops through FundingFactory to earn new technology equipment.
